Reviews.Title: great deal on this
Reviews.Author: rako123
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter .......she loved it !!! This is great product... now the "problem" is that my wife also love it so .... guess what ....  Ihad to buy one more for my wife birthday. Pictures are really really great quality , power charger is dual voltage 110/220 V so me being in Europe is great deal !!! Over all ....great deal , great product , great seller.

Reviews.Title: I believe the 18x zoom is not as it sounds...
Reviews.Author: Sean Brown
Reviews.Content: Good camera, looks nice and the quality is decent, prettys good. But the whole 18x zoom is bs. I bought this camera hoping for a good long shot because I'm out taking pictures of wild life all the ime.This camera is basically zoomed ALL THE WAY OUT!! So in actuality, you have to zoom in at least 10x just to have a regular view. So I guess in reality, this camera is just a plain old 8 zoom like most cameras.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB150 14.2MP WI-Fi Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in White + Samsung 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
